name: Bar Crawl (Joytis)
description:
You're up in the club, very drunk and have lost your friends! Navigate using wacky physics to find your friends and get them safely home while avoiding your evil Ex Derek.

Global Game Jam Submission - 2021: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/goober-game-4

Credits: 

Wiggly boy goodtimes - Clark

Clown wigs, mustaches, and bathrooms??- Liv

Assistant musician boi and writer of bad code- Chris

Hot beats- Andrew
